quiz.title: Economics: Banking, Monetary Policy, and Balance of Payments

questions.question: Bank rate is the rate at which:
options: Central bank lends to commercial banks
questions.explanation: Bank rate is the interest rate at which the central bank lends to commercial banks, influencing liquidity and credit conditions.

questions.question: Monetary policy is controlled by:
questions.explanation: Monetary policy (controlling money supply and interest rates) is usually under the authority of the central bank (e.g., Federal Reserve, ECB, RBI).

questions.question: Balance of Payments records:
questions.explanation: Balance of Payments is a systematic record of all economic transactions between residents of a country and the rest of the world.
